verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, even the whole congregation <WH5712>, came <WH935> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>: and the people <WH5971> abode <WH3427> in Kadesh <WH6946>; and Miriam <WH4813> died <WH4191> there <WH6912>, and was buried there.
And there was no water <WH4325> for the congregation <WH5712>: and they assembled <WH6950> themselves together against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175>.

And the people <WH5971> strove <WH7378> with Moses <WH4872>, and spake <WH559>, saying <WH559>, Would that <WH3863> we had died <WH1478> when our brethren <WH251> died <WH1478> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>!
And why have ye brought <WH935> the assembly <WH6951> of Jehovah <WH3068> into this wilderness <WH4057>, that we should die <WH4191> there <WH1165>, we and our beasts?

And wherefore have ye made us to come up <WH5927> out of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring <WH935> us in unto this evil <WH7451> place <WH4725>? it is no place <WH4725> of seed <WH2233>, or of figs <WH8384>, or of vines <WH1612>, or of pomegranates <WH7416>; neither is there any water <WH4325> to drink <WH8354>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> went <WH935> from the presence <WH6440> of the assembly <WH6951> unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and fell <WH5307> upon their faces <WH6440>: and the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> appeared unto them <WH7200>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH3947> the rod <WH4294>, and assemble <WH6950> the congregation <WH5712>, thou <WH175>, and Aaron thy brother <WH251>, and speak <WH1696> ye unto the rock <WH5553> before their eyes <WH5869>, that it give forth <WH5414> its water <WH4325>; and thou shalt bring forth <WH5414> to them water <WH4325> out <WH3318> of the rock <WH5553>; so thou shalt give <WH8248> the congregation <WH5712> and their cattle drink <WH8248>.
And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the rod <WH4294> from before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, as he commanded him <WH6680>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> gathered <WH6950> the assembly <WH6951> together before <WH6440> the rock <WH5553>, and he said <WH559> unto them <WH8085>, Hear now <WH4784>, ye rebels; shall we bring <WH3318> you forth water <WH4325> out of this rock <WH5553>?

And Moses <WH4872> lifted up <WH7311> his hand <WH3027>, and smote <WH5221> the rock <WH5553> with his rod <WH4294> twice <WH6471>: and water <WH4325> came forth <WH3318> abundantly <WH7227>, and the congregation <WH5712> drank <WH8354>, and their cattle <WH1165>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, Because ye believed <WH539> not in me <WH6942>, to sanctify me in the eyes <WH5869> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, therefore ye shall not bring <WH935> this assembly <WH6951> into the land <WH776> which I have given them <WH5414>.
These are <WH1992> the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>; because the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> strove <WH7378> with Jehovah <WH3068>, and he was sanctified in them <WH6942>.

And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> from Kadesh <WH6946> unto the king <WH4428> of Edom <WH123>, Thus saith <WH559> thy brother <WH251> Israel <WH3478>, Thou knowest <WH3045> all the travail <WH8513> that hath befallen us <WH4672>:

how our fathers <WH1> went down <WH3381> into Egypt <WH4714>, and we dwelt <WH3427> in Egypt <WH4714> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> dealt ill <WH7489> with us <WH1>, and our fathers:

and when we cried <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, he heard <WH8085> our voice <WH6963>, and sent <WH7971> an angel <WH4397>, and brought us forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>: and <WH6946>, behold, we are in Kadesh, a city <WH5892> in the uttermost <WH7097> of thy border <WH1366>.

Let us pass <WH5674>, I pray thee <WH776>, through thy land: we will not pass <WH5674> through field <WH7704> or through vineyard <WH3754>, neither will we drink <WH8354> of the water <WH4325> of the wells <WH875>: we will go <WH3212> along the king <WH4428>'s highway <WH1870>; we will not turn <WH5186> aside to the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>, until we have passed <WH5674> thy border <WH1366>.
And Edom <WH123> said <WH559> unto him <WH5674>, Thou shalt not pass through me <WH3318>, lest I come out with the sword <WH2719> against thee <WH7125>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto him <WH5927>, We will go up by the highway <WH4546>; and if we drink <WH8354> of thy water <WH4325>, I and my cattle <WH4735>, then will I give <WH5414> the price thereof <WH1697>: let me only, without doing anything else <WH5674>, pass through on my feet <WH7272>.
And he said <WH559>, Thou shalt not pass through <WH5674>. And Edom <WH123> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> him with much <WH3515> people <WH5971>, and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>.
Thus Edom <WH123> refused <WH3985> to give <WH5414> Israel <WH3478> passage <WH5674> through his border <WH1366>: wherefore Israel <WH3478> turned away from him <WH5186>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kadesh <WH6946>: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, even the whole congregation <WH5712>, came <WH935> unto mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, by the border <WH1366> of the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>, saying <WH559>,

Aaron <WH175> shall be gathered <WH622> unto his people <WH5971>; for he shall not enter <WH935> into the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, because ye rebelled against <WH4784> my word <WH6310> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>.
Take <WH3947> Aaron <WH175> and Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>, and bring them up <WH5927> unto mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>;

and strip <WH6584> Aaron <WH175> of his garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> them upon Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>: and Aaron <WH175> shall be gathered <WH622> unto his people <WH4191>, and shall die there.
And Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680>: and they went up <WH5927> into mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> in the sight <WH5869> of all the congregation <WH5712>.

And Moses <WH4872> stripped <WH6584> Aaron <WH175> of his garments <WH899>, and put <WH3847> them upon Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121>; and Aaron <WH175> died <WH4191> there on the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>: and Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> came down <WH3381> from the mount <WH2022>.

And when all the congregation <WH5712> saw <WH7200> that Aaron <WH175> was dead <WH1478>, they wept <WH1058> for Aaron <WH175> thirty <WH7970> days <WH3117>, even all the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.
